question:
The ‘Davos in the Desert’ event was conducted in October. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. It is conducted in Qatar.
  2. India boycotted the 3rd edition of the event in protest against the killing of Khashoggi.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: Davos in the Desert is the widely used title of the FII or the Future Investment Initiative forum. It is conducted annually in Riyadh of Saudi Arabia. It was launched in 2017 by the country’s crown prince Mohammad Bin Salman. Statement 2 is incorrect: The Indian PM attended the 3rd edition of FII in 2019. Brazil, Kenya and Nigeria were also represented this year. During the 2nd edition of the event, in 2018, many countries had boycotted it in protest against the Khashoggi murder.
